titles.title: Gulf Region Economic Assistance Tax Relief Act
To increase and expand expensing under section 179 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 for property in hurricane disaster areas declared in 2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/22/2005--Introduced. Gulf Region Economic Assistance Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $10 million the limit on the expensing of business property that is defined as qualified hurricane recovery property (business property placed in service in 2005 and before January 1, 2007, in a federally-declared hurricane recovery area).
